channel.title: Lvls
channel.description: i need two things, to change how much xp is given and the max lvl. i want the max lvl to be like 200 if possible.

item.title: Lvls
item.dc:creator: @justlikers justlikers
item.description:
@justlikers wrote:

there is a tut for the max level…and if you mean xp given by hitting dummies do this
go into your client.java
and search for the code of the object
it will say like “case” and then the code
scroll down a bit and youll see
“give player xp600”
or something liket that, just change it to the xp you want.

Read full topic
